trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for resources that can be added to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Define a classe base para os recursos que podem ser adicionados a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> derived types to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> derivadas de tipos para um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes and flushes the resource to the document package.
trans-unit.target: Confirma todas as alterações e libera os recursos para o pacote do documento.

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method may be delayed until the whole <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Com base nas configurações de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, a operação de liberação do <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> método pode ser atrasado até que todo o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method (in a derived class) when you add resources to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> método (em uma classe derivada) quando você adicionar recursos a um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the I/O stream for reading or writing the resource.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna o fluxo de E/S para ler ou gravar o recurso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for reading or writing the resource.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> para ler ou gravar o recurso.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method (in a derived class) to add resources to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar esse método (em uma classe derivada) para adicionar recursos a um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource that is relative to a specified absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Retorna o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do recurso que é relativo a um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] absoluto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the resource that is relative to the specified absolute <paramref name="inUri" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> do recurso que é relativo ao <paramref name="inUri" /> absoluto especificado.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro dá suporte à infraestrutura do Windows Presentation Foundation e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.
